name: learning_outcome_group_created
definition: The event is emitted anytime a new outcome group is created in the account by an end user or API request.
trigger: Triggered when a new group of learning outcomes is created.

schema.context_id: The ID of the context the learning outcome is used in.
schema.context_type: The type of context the learning outcome is used in, usually Course.
schema.description: Description of the learnning outcome group.
schema.learning_outcome_group_id: The local Canvas ID of the learning outcome group.
schema.parent_outcome_group_id: The local Canvas ID of the group's parent outcome group.
schema.title: Title of the learning outcome group.
schema.vendor_guid: A custom GUID for the learning standard.
schema.workflow_state: Workflow status of the learning outcome group, defaults to active.

body.title: Official Standards for K-12 Math Education
